title: Fragments [4], 1978-168-11-a/d, 1750–99
medium:
Silk
Structure/technique: plain weave [rose red] patterned by floats of a supplementary warp [striped white and shades of green].
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
description: Small fragments: two stripes, the widest a white floral vine and the other a green floral patterned ribbon on a rose red background.
